events.title: Events
events.description: Real-time stream of all billing events
events.helpContent: Every action in QZPay emits events. Use events to react to billing changes in your application, like sending emails when subscriptions are created or payments fail.

empty.startSimulating: Start simulating billing flows to see events here.
empty.noMatchingFilter: No events match the current filter.

tips.tip1: Create a customer to see a customer.created event
tips.tip2: Create a subscription to see multiple events at once
tips.tip3: Click any event to inspect its full payload

modal.webhookInfo: This is the payload that would be sent to your webhook handler in a real application. Use this data to update your database, send notifications, or trigger other actions.

state.title: State
state.description: View the complete billing state stored in localStorage
state.helpContent: This view shows the raw data stored in your browser's localStorage. It's useful for debugging and understanding how QZPay stores data.
state.helpNote: Click on any node to expand it and see the nested data structure.
